alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 8:25PM CST until February 08 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River At Logansport affecting De Soto, Shelby and Panola Counties. For the Sabine River...including Mineola, Hawkins, Gladewater, Longview, Beckville, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River At Logansport. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Expect lowland flooding problems of the heavily wooded floodplain to continue for several days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 26.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 28.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 830 PM CST.
